mapper.select: SELECT m.menuId menuId, m.menuName menuName, m.url url, m.permissionIdentifier permissionIdentifier, m.parentId parentId, m.icon icon FROM sys_menu m JOIN role_menu rm ON rm.menuId = m.menuId JOIN sys_role sr ON sr.roleId = rm.roleId JOIN user_role ur ON ur.roleId = sr.roleId JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = ur.userId WHERE su.id = #{userId} AND sr.deleteFlag = 1 AND m.deleteFlag = 1 GROUP BY menuId
SELECT m.menuId menuId, m.menuName menuName, m.url url, m.permissionIdentifier permissionIdentifier, m.parentId parentId, m.icon icon FROM sys_menu m WHERE m.deleteFlag = 1

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_menu sm WHERE 1 = 1
AND sm.menuName LIKE '%${menuName}%'
AND sm.description LIKE '%${description}%'
AND sm.url LIKE '%${url}%'
AND createTime LIKE '%${createTime}%'
AND icon LIKE '%${icon}%'

SELECT sm.menuId, sm.menuName, sm.url, sm.permissionIdentifier, sm.icon, sm.deleteFlag, sm.description, sm.createTime , sm.parentId, (CASE sm.parentId WHEN '0' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) isParent FROM sys_menu sm WHERE 1 = 1
AND sm.menuName LIKE '%${menuName}%'
AND sm.description LIKE '%${description}%'
AND createTime LIKE '%${createTime}%'
AND sm.url LIKE '%${url}%'
AND icon LIKE '%${icon}%'
LIMIT #{page},#{limit}
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu SET menuName = #{menuName}, url = #{url}, icon = #{icon}, deleteFlag = #{deleteFlag}, description =#{description}, parentId = #{parentId} WHERE menuId = #{menuId}

UPDATE sys_menu SET deleteFlag = 0 WHERE menuId IN
#{menuId}
UPDATE sys_menu SET deleteFlag = 1 WHERE menuId = #{menuId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu(menuName, url, permissionIdentifier, parentId, icon, deleteFlag, description, createTime) VALUES (#{menuName}, #{url}, #{permissionIdentifier}, #{parentId}, #{icon}, #{deleteFlag}, #{description}, #{createTime})
